awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.

fullplot: A Michigan farmer and a prospector form a partnership in the California gold country. Their adventures include buying and sharing a wife, hijacking a stage, kidnaping six prostitutes, and turning their mining camp into a boomtown. Along the way there is plenty of drinking, gambling, and singing. They even find time to do some creative gold mining.
plot: Two unlikely prospector partners share the same wife in a California gold rush mining town.
title: Paint Your Wagon
